instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED] 820-2390 GPU or Mux (it's the screen!)
threads.message:
What is happening here? 

Bad gpu, mux or lvds ?

threads.title: [SOLVED] 820-2390 GPU or Mux (it's the screen!)
threads.message: Bad LCD seems more likely. Try another assembly first.

threads.title: [SOLVED] 820-2390 GPU or Mux (it's the screen!)
threads.message: [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]  Thank you for answering. Need too order a new for testing. Will report after.

threads.title: [SOLVED] 820-2390 GPU or Mux (it's the screen!)
threads.message: Get LCD and cable. No need to rip apart this one and finding it is a board issue. Any 15 or 17 assembly can be used to test.
